column5: I am a 15 year veteran of Lac Seul waters and outpost camps that is looking for additional men to round out a camp for a week of fishing in late June-09. I will be boating in to this northern outpost with my Lund 2025 & fishing partner. 4 open slots available. Boat-in or Fly-in available. The camp will accomodate 8-10, but I prefer 6 max. Group of 4 friends from Florida Keys who are regulars crapped out this year due to the poor economy... EXCEPTIONAL fishing in late June opportunity for 2 or 4 adult men. Reply if interested with your details...Thnx,Rich

Rich, I live in Central Wisconsin and I would be interested in finding out more about your trip to see if it would be a good fit for both of us. I have been to Canada fishing over a dozen times, mostly up the Red Lake Road area. If you would like to e-mail me direct, my address is [email protected] If you include your phone number I would be happy to call you so we could exchange our information and our fishing experiences, to see what you are looking for in a fishing partner and if it will work out. Regards, Rich

My group has dwindled to three at Lac Seul Outposts, May 31-June 6. Can't even have a decent euchre game. If there is a 1-3 man group looking for a spot, send me an email. I have been fishing NE Lac Seul for 27 years straight. email: [email protected]
Combining groups could be a possibility. I'm at [email protected].
